meanings.definition: A prickly plant with bright red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The chicalote in the garden has sharp thorns.
meanings.sent2: I picked a beautiful chicalote from the field.
meanings.sent3: The chicalote tried to hug me with its prickly arms!
meanings.sent4: Her fiery personality was like a chicalote in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The chicalote's vibrant red petals stood out in the desert landscape.

meanings.definition: The bright red flower of the chicalote plant.
meanings.sent1: She wore a lovely chicalote in her hair.
meanings.sent2: The chicalote's color brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The chicalote winked at me from the vase.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks turned as red as a chicalote in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The chicalote's beauty captivated all who passed by.
